verses.verse: And Samuel <WH8050> said <WH559> unto Saul <WH7586>, Jehovah <WH3068> sent <WH7971> me to anoint <WH4886> thee to be king <WH4428> over his people <WH5971>, over Israel <WH3478>: now therefore hearken <WH8085> thou unto the voice <WH6963> of the words <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068>.
